SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.services

Class GameStateService

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.services.GameStateService
public class GameStateService extends Object
Service that handles persistent state within the game runtime Stores persistent data such as stars, unlocks, selected hero, and level progress

      public void setBase(Entity player)
      Sets the current Base entity to track health
      Parameters:

      public int getStars()
      Gets the current number of stars
      Returns:
      current number of stars

    • setStars

      public void setStars(int newStars)
      Sets the current number of stars to the given number
      Parameters:
      newStars - new number of stars

    • updateStars

      public void updateStars(int increment)
      Increments the current number of stars by the given number
      Parameters:
      increment - the number of stars to increment by

    • spendStars

      public boolean spendStars(int amount)
      Attempts to spend the given number of stars.
      Parameters:
      amount - number of stars to spend
      Returns:
      true if the stars were successfully spent, false if not enough stars

    • rewardStarsOnWin

      public void rewardStarsOnWin()
      Rewards stars at the end of a stage based on the player's remaining health. Uses the player/base entity that was set in GameStateService.

    • rewardStarsByHealth

      public void rewardStarsByHealth(double healthPercent)
      Rewards stars based on remaining health percentage. 80–100% -> 3★, 50–79% -> 2★, 1–49% -> 1★, 0% -> 0★
      Parameters:
      healthPercent - a value from 0.0 (dead) to 1.0 (full health)

    • getHeroUnlocks

      public Map<GameStateService.HeroType,Boolean> getHeroUnlocks()
      Gets the current unlock flags for the heroes
      Returns:
      map of the current hero unlocks

    • setHeroUnlocked

      public void setHeroUnlocked(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Marks the given hero as unlocked
      Parameters:
      hero - hero to unlock

    • setHeroUnlocked

      public void setHeroUnlocked(GameStateService.HeroType hero, boolean unlocked)
      Marks the given hero as locked or unlocked based on input
      Parameters:
      hero - hero to unlock
      unlocked - true if it should be unlocked, false otherwise

    • setSelectedHero

      public void setSelectedHero(GameStateService.HeroType type)
      Sets the current selected hero
      Parameters:
      type - the HeroType of the selected hero

    • setSelectedSkin

      public void setSelectedSkin(GameStateService.HeroType hero, String skinKey)
      设置某个英雄当前皮肤（UI 下拉调用这里） 可在这里做合法性校验（是否在 availableSkins 里）
